name: Ridha Mahmood
title: B.S. Computer Science Candidate | Software Engineering Minor
summary: Computer Science student with hands-on experience in automation, data integrity, and building small web apps. Comfortable shipping projects end-to-end and explaining technical choices clearly.
target_roles: AI/ML Engineering or related software roles

bullets: Maintained Microsoft Power Automate workflows for invoice intake and approvals, reducing manual touches.
Integrated Microsoft Dynamics NAV and Excel validation to remove duplicates and surface exceptions.
Operated VM-based processing jobs and wrote runbooks/failover steps to keep workflows reliable during peak volume.
Audited vendor accounts and reconciled statements in QuickBooks and Excel.
Streamlined monthly reports by cleaning inputs and documenting repeatable steps.
Assisted with secure workflow documentation and small data migrations.

projects.name: Ridha-GPT (Personal Assistant Website)
projects.desc: ChatGPT-style site that answers questions about Ridha in full sentences using retrieval over a structured profile.
details: Frontend built with React, Vite, and Tailwind; backend uses Netlify Functions in JavaScript.
Uses embeddings to ground answers about Ridha; answers general questions normally via the model.

projects.name: Python Discord Bot
details: Cog-based bot with !ping, !roll, and per-server TODOs backed by SQLite.
Added GitHub Actions CI, structured logging, dotenv-managed secrets, and a Dockerfile for reproducible deploys.

projects.name: AI Accessibility Website
details: Improved accessibility with WCAG 2.1 practices, ARIA semantics, and keyboard-only navigation.
Used Lighthouse and axe to identify and fix contrast and heading issues.

education.degree: B.S. in Computer Science (Minor: Software Engineering)
